topic.title: Editing XML Documents in Text Mode

body.p: The Text editing mode is designed to be a simple, yet powerful, XML source editor. You can use this mode to edit XML code, markup, and text and it provides support to help you transform, and debug XML-based documents. It is similar to other common text editors, but also includes specialized editing actions, a powerful Content Completion Assistant, a helpful Outline view, and many other unique features.
To switch to this mode, select Text at the bottom of the editing area.
